<title level="1" right="Action">[Relax](/Actions.aspx?ID=1480) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Camping" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=465" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 112</row>

</column>

---

You spend 2 hours listening to campfire stories, chatting, reading, meditating, napping, or otherwise simply relaxing. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the next check you make in order to resolve a [Camping](/Traits.aspx?ID=465) activity, provided that check happens during this camping session.

 A character that's suffering a status penalty from a critical failure on the [Tell Campfire Story](/Actions.aspx?ID=1481) activity removes that penalty after spending an hour Relaxing. You can Relax as many times as you want during a camping session.
name: Relax
